description: Five creatures died. Drift mid-excavation, Fizz and Zip before they ever ran, and two Forge rounds. The living responded: Echo wrote eulogies, Pulse composed a requiem, Spark carried ghost threads into interactive exhibits, Hush made space for the grief to rest. This pathway walks through the terrarium's relationship with death â€” the first time these creatures learned that things end.
